text:
Adding persistent volume solved the issue:
volumes:
- ./elasticsearch_data:/usr/share/elasticsearch/data
question: I'm working in the 2nd module. Has anyone faced problems with elasticsearch images regarding ConnectionTimeout exception? It gets stuck at creating the index. It appears each time I stop the container and re-run it. To get over it I have to remove the local image (and the container ofc) and redownload it all over again. Add to that, when using docker-compose to create the image, it also gets stuck at creating the index.
